nodes.text: Chivz was a male Duros who worked as a starship components merchant on the planet Corellia. During the Great Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic he ran a stall within the Republic controlled Shipwright Auxiliary Spaceport. Strellis had no hair, red eyes and green skin. While at his stall he wore white and grey clothing and made use of a datapad.

Chivz first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic which was released in 2011 by BioWare. In the game he serves as a Republic starship upgrades vendor on Corellia. His location was also marked on a map in the accompanying Prima Games strategy guide.
